findings.rationale: The agreement specifies a term of three years, but does not clarify if confidentiality obligations continue beyond this period, potentially leading to misuse of confidential information after the term.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Clarity on Return of Information
findings.rationale: The requirement to return or destroy information may be ambiguous, leading to potential non-compliance and misuse of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, each party shall return or destroy all Confidential Information received from the other party.
